modName: Knights of Skyrim - Knights of the Nine Remake
summary: This mod adds all of the items from Knights of the Nine aswell as 6 NPC\'s to protect them
descriptionHtml:
At the moment the Armor included in This Mod Is Using Default Blades Armor Model And Texture this Will Change In Update 1.5 Which Will Be Released Sometime Tomorrow

If you find any bugs please post them in the comments, Thanks

Knights of Skyrim

	-=Credit=-

- InsanitySorrow [skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37645/?]

	-=Info=-
So far the \"Knights of Skyrim\" Mod adds 6 new NPC\'s and 7 new items.

	-=Changelog=-

	-=SPOILERS=-

Paladin 1 Location - ReachwindEyrie01
Paladin 2 Location - TraitorsPostExterior01
Paladin 3 Location - AbandonedShackExterior
Paladin 4 Location - AlchemistsShackExterior
Paladin 5 Location - AbandonedPrisonExterior01
Paladin 6 Location - AngasMillExterior
author: TurnItRedux
